    Entreprises

    Paul-Antoine Chevalier

    2018-12-10

    entreprises.Rmd

    Get company

    get_company(siret = "38235772100028") %>% head()
#> $id
#> [1] 144731711
#> 
#> $siren
#> [1] "382357721"
#> 
#> $siret
#> [1] "38235772100028"
#> 
#> $nic
#> [1] "00028"
#> 
#> $l1_normalisee
#> [1] "PARIS SAINT GERMAIN FOOTBALL"
#> 
#> $l2_normalisee
#> [1] "PSG"

    Get companies nearby

    Search companies by name

    search_company(string = "Paris Saint Germain") %>% 
  magrittr::extract2("etablissement") %>% 
  tibble::as_tibble() %>% 
  dplyr::glimpse()
